overview:
Martin Perez is a software professional and entrepeneur.

He has been creating software within different sectors since more than ten years ago. He started his career in the healthcare industry in Spain where he designed and developed and architected costs management software for clinical institutions.

Later he moved to Ireland where he became a software architect for a leading company in the sector of FX trading. After a couple of years he created his own company and started to sell software development services for companies working in the payments industry. During this stage he co-founded <a href="http://www.jobsket.com">Jobsket</a> a company centered on creating tools to help people to promote their CVs and companies to find suitable candidates.

Martin has also been involved in Open Source development. He founded <a href="http://sourceforge.net/projects/jlibrary">jLibrary</a> a document management system which was nominated twice as best Open Source application developed in the Eclipse RCP platform.
